_comment: This is an image configuration file, it is used for creating the image file header.

header._comment: The length of the header with all it's elements. This must be checked.
header.name: headerLength

header._comment: The image id must be unique for each image on an OTAP Server. The server will assign an image ID.
header.name: imageId

header._comment: The image version must completely identify the target hardware and software.
header.name: imageVersion

header._comment: If the size of the value text is larger than the object zie attribute then it will be truncated.
header.name: headerString
header.value: FSL BLE OTAP Demo Image File

header._comment: The server will determine the value of this attribute based on the binary image size + header size + sub-elements sizes.
header.name: totalImageFileSize
